      static org.json.JSONObject ActivityMessage.getActivityRegisterJSON​(java.lang.String activityName)
      This is a helper method to get the URL of an activity mapped to an intent.

      This is a helper method to get the URL of an activity mapped to an intent.
      org.json.JSONObject ActivityRequest.getActivityRequest()
      Returns a JSONObject representing the entire request.
      static org.json.JSONObject ActivityMessage.httpGetRequest​(java.lang.String url)
      The httpGetRequest method can be used by ActivityConfig Handlers to make service calls.
      static org.json.JSONObject ActivityMessage.httpPostRequest​(java.lang.String url, java.lang.Object body, java.lang.String mediaType)
      The httpPostRequest method can be used by ActivityConfig Handlers to make service calls.
      static org.json.JSONObject ActivityMessage.httpPostRequest​(java.lang.String url, org.json.JSONObject body)
      The httpPostRequest method can be used by ActivityConfig Handlers to make service calls.
      void ActivityHandler.init​(java.lang.String classExtName, java.lang.String configFile, javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo)
      The init method will initialize the Class and load the configuration data for the class to operate.
      void ActivityHandler.registerActivity​(ActivityConfig activity)
      This method registers the activity with the CharliAI registry service and assumes that the activity object has been set as part of the config file and/or as part of the init process.
      org.json.JSONObject ActivityMessage.send​(java.lang.String url)
      Helper method to quickly send an activity message.
      void ActivityConfig.setActivityConfig​(org.json.JSONObject activity)
      This method will set all the activity parameters based on the passed JSON configuration.
      void Interaction.setInteractionType​(java.lang.String type)
      Returns the interaction type.
      void ActivityMessage.setStatus​(java.lang.String code)
      Sets the message status and should be one of the valid status codes.
      void Workflow.setSteps​(org.json.JSONArray plan)
      Sets the steps in the plan.
      org.json.JSONObject Interaction.toJSONObject()
      Returns a JSON Object representation of the interaction.
      org.json.JSONObject Workflow.toJSONObject()
      Returns a JSON Object representation of the workflow.
      Constructors in com.charliai.activities.api that throw ActivityException 
      Constructor Description
      ActivityConfig​(org.json.JSONObject activity)
      The ActivityConfig instantiation method will create a new activity object based on the JSONObject passed as a parameter.
      ActivityMessage​(java.lang.String message)
      Creates a new message object with the body of the message passed as a JSON string.
      ActivityMessage​(java.lang.String status, java.lang.String statusMessage)
      Creates a new message object and sets the status as well as the status message.
      ActivityRequest​(java.lang.String messageRequest)
      Sets the activity request object based on the JSON message.
      ActivityRequest​(org.json.JSONObject request)
      Constructor that access a fully formatted JSON activity request message and initializes the object.
      Interaction​(org.json.JSONObject json)  
      Step​(org.json.JSONObject step)
      Constructor that will build a Step object with the passed JSON structure.
      Workflow​(org.json.JSONObject json)
      This Workflow constructor will set the basic details of the object based on the incoming workflow message.
